-1.title: All in the Family
-1.plot: PAUL TRANSFORMS ACTIVE IMAGE/HALEY TRIES TO LAND A MAJOR CAMPAIGN - Since Paul first laid eyes on Haley in St. Louis he knew he had found a star. With JT's help, Haley gets a chance to land a new campaign for Paul Mitchell. But is she too green to land the gig? Meanwhile, Paul travels to Columbus, OH where he faces an uphill battle as he tries to bring an outdated family-run modeling agency into the 21st Century. If Paul is unable to convince their owner to embrace high fashion, he may have to look in a different direction.

1.title: A Latte to Learn
1.plot: Paul travels to Minneapolis to meet modeling agency owner Brita Jackson and her team at Arquette & Associates. Paul is really frustrated to discover that Brita - in the aftermath of 16 models being stolen away by one of her employees - has basically given up on her agency. Meanwhile, Paul and his trusted number two at The Network, Olga Tavarez, must decide which four new faces on their roster are going to be selected to travel to New York to audition for Fashion Week.

2.title: Modeling School or Modeling Agency
2.plot: PAUL TRANSFORMS FIERCE MODELING AGENCY/FINAL PUSH FOR SHOWS AT FASHION WEEK - With the end of New York Fashion week approaching, Meghan, Bobby and Mariana give it all they have as they try to book a show. Despite creating some buzz, one model's chances hang in the balance. Elsewhere, Paul and his team head to Rapid City, SD where Paul is shocked to find out they are running a modeling school along with their modeling agency. Paul needs to convince them to drop the school in order to remain in The Network.

3.title: The Gummy Bear
3.plot: PAUL TRANSFORMS THE EMERGE AGENCY/ANNELISE TRIES AGAIN - After having her dreams cut short while in New York for Fashion Week, Annelise gets one more shot at modeling as she attempts to land a major clothing campaign with the help of The Network. Meanwhile, Paul and his team go to Orlando, FL, where he faces his toughest challenge yet, an agency owner who stands her ground and refuses to change. Will Paul be able to get through to her and keep her as a part of The Network?

4.title: 3 Men and a Little Agency
4.plot: PAUL TRANSFORMS THE COURTIER AGENCY/MEGHAN'S MODELING CAREER IS IN JEOPARDY - After drawing a lot of interest at New York Fashion Week, The Network lands rising star, Meghan, an opportunity to meet with Elle Magazine. But when JT finds out that Meghan is failing high school, the trip is suddenly in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Paul travels to Phoenix, AZ, where he visits a new agency looking to join The Network. Do the all-male owners have what it takes to pass Paul's test?

5.title: Attitude Adjustment
5.plot: PAUL TRANSFORMS CENTRO MODELS/SHAUGHNESSY GETS THE CHANCE OF A LIFETIME - After being discovered during a previous visit to The Network's Orlando agency, Emerge, Shaughnessy lands an opportunity to walk in an Andy Hilfiger fashion show in Miami. While there, Shaughnessy get the chance to vie for a major purse campaign. Elsewhere, Paul and his team travel to St. Louis, MO, where a once thriving Network agency is beginning to show its age.

7.title: Sending the Wrong Image
7.plot: PAUL TRANSFORMS THE BLAZE MODELING AGENCY/MEGHAN NEW CAMPAIGN HAS HER IN OVER HER HEAD - The Network's new superstar Meghan has booked a new watch campaign, but it involves working with a male model. Can Meghan feel comfortable enough with her new male partner to keep this once in a lifetime opportunity, or will her inexperience ruin her chances? Elsewhere, Paul heads down to Hermosa Beach, CA where a persistent but misguided agency owner has begged for an opportunity to work with the Network. Will Paul be able to get her to change her ways, or will he pass on letting...

8.title: Hold'em or Fold'em
8.plot: PAUL TRANSFORMS LENZ MODELING/ANDREA AND EVA GO HEAD TO HEAD - Weeks after Paul discovered the stunningly beautiful sisters,Andrea and Eva in St Louis, they head to New York to try and land a photo shoot for Seventeen Magazine. The only thing standing in their way is each other as Seventeen will only feature one sister. Meanwhile Paul and his team head to Las Vegas, NV to revisit an old modeling mentor and member of The Network only to find that his friend has let his agency and himself go down hill. Will Paul be able to come up with a plan to not only save his agency...

imdb.plot outline: During the heyday of the "supermodel" era in the 1980s and early 1990s, Paul Fisher was a legend in the modeling industry. With his bigger-than-life personality and often brutally frank opinions, he earned his reputation as a star-maker through his uncanny ability to spot the potential superstar in a group of inexperienced young models. Now he's taking his passion for the business and focusing it on bringing small agencies from around the world together under his new venture called The Network.
imdb.title: Remodeled
plot: During the heyday of the "supermodel" era in the 1980s and early 1990s, Paul Fisher was a legend in the modeling industry. With his bigger-than-life personality and often brutally frank opinions, he earned his reputation as a star-maker through his uncanny ability to spot the potential superstar in a group of inexperienced young models. Now he's taking his passion for the business and focusing it on bringing small agencies from around the world together under his new venture called The Network.::CW Publicity
